Making it personal.

Beyond our corporate charitable investments, Charles Koch and David Koch have personally given millions of dollars to worthwhile causes. Koch Family Foundations & Philanthropy recipients include cancer research, medical centers and entities dedicated to societal and cultural progress.

Fighting Cancer
Read Story

David H. Koch has pledged $150 million to help build a state-of-the-art outpatient medical facility at the Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center in New York City. This follows his $686 million in gifts to cancer research and medical facilities across New York City and beyond.

Youth Entrepreneurs

Founded in 1991 by the Charles Koch Foundation, Youth Entrepreneurs provides high school students with values-based entrepreneurial experiences and education that not only instill practical knowledge but also inspire them to prosper.
